name: GBA Video ~ Legend of Lofi
description: GBA video featuring Legend of Lofi music by Lo Fidelity Cassette Tape Perplexity and the Boys along with gameplay visuals from OOT and MM! You can watch/listen to this GBA rom in most GBA emulators or on original hardware.  Hold A to fast forward (don't fast forward for too long on the original hardware) and click B to start over.  Available on cartridges. Send a message on IG if interested: @cassettetapeperplexity
